author: Nintendo of America
description:
Grab your hoverboard and ride the beat in Synth Riders, out now on Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/synth-riders-switch/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1021-01&utm_id=P1021-01 

Experience a high-octane cyberpunk musical adventure where you catch notes, weave through obstacles, and ride neon rails in perfect sync with the beat. Jam solo or with friends to a huge music library filled with top artists. Rebels are racing against time to stop the ruthless AI from seizing control in this adrenaline-fueled musical battleground. Can you defeat XANDER? 

#NintendoSwitch #SynthRiders 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/nintendo
title: Synth Riders – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Divinity: Original Sin 2 – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition is out now: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/divinity-original-sin-2-nintendo-switch-2-edition-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01 

Choose your role in a compelling story and explore a world that reacts to who you are and the choices you make. With five races to choose from, and an adventure playable solo or as a party of up to four, lay waste to an oppressive order in a world afraid of magic. Become the god the world so desperately needs! 

#NintendoSwitch2 #DivinityOriginalSin2 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

title: Divinity: Original Sin 2 – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition – Launch Trailer
